episodes.title: Surviving a Cult-Adjacent Hostel on the AT | Thru-Hiker Tales & Controversies Explored
episodes.description:
Join me on a unique section of the Appalachian Trail as I stay at a hiker hostel run by the controversial Twelve Tribes community. Discover the behind-the-scenes of cultish vibes, community traditions, and hiking life as I navigate this intriguing experience. From game nights back in the bunkhouse to a closer look at the Twelve Tribes' way of life, I share my honest impressions and what it’s like to stay at a hostel with potential cult connections. Watch to see if the wilderness and social dynamics come together or clash in this fascinating adventure along the AT.

Keywords: Appalachian Trail, thru-hiking, hiker hostel, Twelve Tribes, cult vibes, Trail life, hiking adventure, backpacking, trail stories, youth hostels, hiking community, urban vs. wilderness, travel vlog
